attributes.title: 2017 Kia Rio 1.2 5-dr

attributes.description:
Pearl White with Tan leather, Full service history with spare key, ARB steel bumper with built in fog lights and LED light bar, Winch, Dual battery system, BF Goodrich all terrain tyres, Factory fitted running boards, Limited Sahara edition, Long range fuel tank, Factory fitted electric operated tilt and slide sunroof with blind slider, Extra row seats, Tow bar with off road trailer electrical coupling, Performance mapped at Steve's auto clinic, Retractable side mirrors, Cruise control, Tire monitoring system, 6 Zone front and rear climate control, SRS Airbags, Power steering, Touch screen SAT/NAV, 4 High and low range with centre diff lock, Centre console fridge, Touch screen radio with front loader CD charger, Electric windows,mirrors,seats and steering, Motorola Bluetooth, USB connect, Sunglass holders, Cup holders, Garmin, Rear DVD entertainment system with remote and head phones, Full floor protective carpeting, Key operated central locking with alarm/immobilizer.

CONTACT DETAILS:
Phone Cape SUV : 021 982 0334
Niel : 081 408 9188
Martin : 072 246 1367
Visit our website on www.capesuv.co.za

Please confirm dealerships banking details before making a payment to avoid extensive email fraud.
2 Year optional warranty available.
Trade ins welcome.
We are an authorized financial service provider.
This is an authentic advertisement with a reputable dealer. Please be aware of scams by fraudsters using other advertiser’s photos. DO NOT pay over any deposits unless you have confirmed the details of the vehicle directly with the dealer.
Please note: While every care is taken to avoid mistakes, the dealer cannot accept liability for any errors, misprints or omissions in the printing of an advertisement. Please confirm all facts and features, i.e. leather trim etc with the dealer before making a purchase.

attributes.description: We offer a premium selection of approved and quality inspected vehicles you can purchase with confidence. All vehicles undergo our OEM mechanical inspection as well as a third-party road worthy certificate upon delivery. We do assist with finance and deliver nationwide to make your experience as effortless as possible. Service/ maintenance plans and mechanical warranties are available for your peace of mind. All trade ins are accepted subject to view. All above services are included in our on the road fees. Contact us today for an unbeatable quote.

attributes.title: 2021 Hyundai Tucson 2.0 CRDi Sport Auto

attributes.description: The light and compact Suzuki Swift with its 1.2l petrol engine offers high output and exceptional fuel consumption at as little as 4.9l / 100km. Every detail of the third-generation Swift has been cleverly designed to make you feel at one with your new car. The Swift’s floating roof design, solid shoulder lines, and rich side body sculpting unite to give you a driving experience that thrills. Its low, short, wide stance has a presence that can’t be ignored, making you stand out wherever you go. Designed to give you all the right feels, the new Suzuki Swift is a bold statement in design and style. Book your test drive today...
